This is a simple and easy-to-use scoreboard app for Taekwondo.
Please use it for practice and matches.


●Basic Rules
Matches have 3 rounds with 2 minutes each, and the player with the most points wins. In case of a tie, an extra round (1 minute) will be held.  If there is a penalty, one point will be added to the opponent's score,, and 10 penalties will result in disqualification.

In this app, when a player commits 10 penalties, the number will turn yellow.


● Basic functions
1. Adding and subtracting points
You can add or subtract points by tapping the button next to the score. You can also add points by tapping the score.

2. Player name
Tap "Player1" or "Player2" on the screen to enter the player's name.

3. Penalties
You can add  or subtract  a penalty count by tapping the button next to the penalty area. You can also add penalties by tapping the penalty area..

4. Timer
Tap the time to start the timer. If you want to stop it, tap it again. The timer usually lasts for two minutes, with one minute for extra round(Golden round) and intervals.

5. Reset
Tap the gear icon at the bottom center of the screen to display the menu, where you can reset the score, timer and penalty count.
